title: Pixel 4a 5g - No Voicemail Notification - Sprint
content:
Phone will not give VM notification. Pixel Support and Sprint Support throw up hands each blaming the other. Every search I do gives the solution of Settings then Voicemail ... but the 4a 5g does not have Voicemail as an option under settings...
Going in through phone app and hitting triple dots then Settings then Voicemail then Notifications brings up Show Notifications toggle (which is to the right and apparently on) but the toggle cant be turned off and on again - not reactive to touch. Restarting does not help.

Help! Not sure where else to turn.
